name: reporting
description: This project generates reports on progress in terms of work done on SAEON's Catalogue software by interacting with the Github API

scripts.start: rimraf .build && nodemon --watch ./src --exec 'prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node --no-warnings --experimental-top-level-await --experimental-json-modules src/index.js'

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
